resources.string:
Explainer is an educational team word game in which player needs to explain and team should guess as many words as possible over a period of time.

 For each correct word team gets a point. The team with the highest number of points wins.

 When player explains he cannot use cognate words, translate into another language and explicitly show words with gestures.
- Team gets 1 point for every guessed word. When word skips, point minuses.\n\n- If team has not enough time to guess last word, team gets 0 points.
Game keeps before one of team get enough points to win. If in the moment round finishing teams has the same points, additional round starts.
If the controversial points happened, for example using of implicit cognate word - you can redact result after time ends. Use option "take away the word" to count 0 team points.
